title: FS: Chance S460, Burchell AB350, Merritt C350
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Chance S460, Burchell AB350, Merritt C350
posts.post_content:
Three very nice cards with somewhat tough backs.  Standard paypal preferred.

Chance Batting Sovereign 460 PSA 3 - $350
(this card sold in [URL="http://goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=23920"]March Goodwin for $421[/URL])

George Merritt Cycle 350 PSA 4 - $200
(this card sold in [URL="http://goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=24928"]June Goodwin for $259[/URL])

Fred Burchell American Beauty 350 Frame - $150
(highest SGC graded in pop of four; only two higher in pop of eight in PSA)
